document_data.name: Asha Vandree
document_data.mainbody: '''Asha Vandree''' was a [[drow]] priestess of [[Lolth]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Asha was ambitious enough to dream of ruling the outpost, but not so courageous as to openly challenge [[Ilvara Mizzrym]], also knowing that for a permanent assignment she needed to also impress her superiors in [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.Relationship: Asha initially considered Ilvara Mizzrym as a model to imitate, but changed her mind after the senior priestess discarded [[Jorlan Duskryn]] without hesitation.
document_data.Activities: Asha was a drow of Menzoberranzan and a member of [[House Vandree]], living in the [[Velkynvelve]] outpost, acting as a junior priestess and second-in-command to Ilvara.
